title: tavintavan
author: tavintavan
content: The Economist MagazineOn his cover, he predicted the collapse and fall of the marketsThe markets will fall in the following order.1. unknown asset, currency, market.2. the fall of ethereum3. the fall of the dollar4. the fall of bitcoin5. the fall of the securities market6. the fall ......7. the fall of the real estate marketHow did you prepare for this?And what do you think about it?

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: We’ll have to wait & see won’t we. At the moment the FED are doing everything to avoid admitting that we are in a recession. Smaller nations have conceded that the macro economic picture does not look very good. The world super power, the US, has so far avoided telling us that a recession is here.We will know by the end of 2023 if there is a recession. Let’s keep our eyes fully on the US & what happens in their markets.

comments.author: yusrime
comments.body: Quote from: tavintavan on January 27, 2023, 04:36:36 AMThe Economist MagazineOn his cover, he predicted the collapse and fall of the marketsThe markets will fall in the following order.1. unknown asset, currency, market.2. the fall of ethereum3. the fall of the dollar4. the fall of bitcoin5. the fall of the securities market6. the fall ......7. the fall of the real estate marketHow did you prepare for this?And what do you think about it?https://i.ytimg.com/vi/tzAo0a45iV4/maxresdefault.jpgkey is analysing the market and be aware of mass scale bussiness trends
